text: Crunchie is a brand of chocolate bar. They are chocolate bars that have been filled with honeycomb toffee and covered in a chocolate coating. Crunchie is owned by Cadbury. The chocolate bar was first made in 1929 by J. S. Fry & Sons in England. The chocolate bar is advertised with the slogan "Get that Friday feeling" in the United Kingdom. Crunchie had the longest-running television advertisement in New Zealand with an advertisement called the "Crunchie Train Robbery" which was made in 1975. It won many awards. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1929 establishments Category:Chocolate bars
title: Crunchie
